tr.td: Westfield wins toss-defers; Fitchburg to kick and defend north endzone
MichaelOrellana kickoff 61 yards to the FIT04, Steven Vasquez return 20 yards to the FIT24 (Nick Andre; Spencer Thomas).
Sterlin Garvin rush for 8 yards to the FIT32 (Nick Borsari; John Ollari).
G. Dellechiaie pass complete to Sterlin Garvin for 2 yards to the FIT34 (John Ollari).
G. Dellechiaie pass incomplete to Ty Spencer.
Sterlin Garvin rush for loss of 2 yards to the FIT32 (Joey Mespelli).
G. Dellechiaie sacked for loss of 3 yards to the FIT29 (Marc. Pettigrew).

Bryan Waruhiu rush for 1 yard to the WSU36 (Pedro Camilo; Luis Feliz).
